thread.section_title: Hotel delle Nazioni - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Recomendable
thread.title_full: Recomendable - Review of Hotel delle Nazioni, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Håkon S
title: Recomendable
text: Stayed here for three days, and have only good things to say. Comfortable rooms, not too big, silent and nice. Good breakfast with a good glutenfrie option. The location is absolutely perfect. Less than one minute from the Trevirke fountain, five minutes to the Spanish steps, walking distance to major sights in downtown Rome, even to St Peter´s church. I will definetly use this hotel again.
